subtitleNullable: This is a random data of X supermarket for customer segmentation
descriptionNullable:
This data is generated randomly for customer segmentation purpose, you can also perform any other problems.
This data contains a Assumed supermarket data. 
1. Customer - one lakh customer details incl address, phone, email ...etc
2. Products - 300 manually generated products referring walmart
3. categories - 30 categories which the products fall under
4. Transactions - one lakh transactions made by the customers 
5. Feedback - textual reviews (which are extracted from other resources) 
6. Redemption - redemptions customers redeemed their coupons previously
7. coupons - customers who have coupons for future discounts, and status of those coupons
8. Supplier - details of the supliers if incase any products are running low
9. Employees - List of the employees, who worked with the supermarket since 2017 to 2024.

## Happy coding............................................................................................................................
